revision.text:
{{codepointer|Spawn}}'''A_TossGib''' (no parameters) Spawns one actor of type [[Classes:Meat|Meat]] (for bleeding monsters) or [[Classes:Junk|Junk]] (for everything else) and tosses it in a random direction. Actors of type [[Classes:Meat|Meat]] randomly show a sprite from MEATAx–MEATTx.
Actors of type [[Classes:Junk|Junk]] randomly show a sprite from JUNKAx–JUNKTx. == Examples == {{noexamples}}
